item.tcc.obsidian_mirror: Lookin' Glass o' Rock o' Tears
tcc.tellraws.reloaded: §e§l[Ship Fixer]: §rReloaded ye packs o' data and Code o' Creeper scoreboards
tcc.tellraws.initiate.5: Click here to go to the official website
tcc.tellraws.initiate.7: Click here to see changelog notes
tcc.tellraws.initiate.wrong_version: §4Ye be attemptin' ter use TCC on tha incorrect version. The correct version ter use is Minecraft 1.14.4.
tcc.tellraws.terminate.2: §4scoreboards have been thrown overboard. Click this here link fer tha rest o' the steps o' terminatin'.
tcc.tellraws.terminate.3: §3Thank ye for usin' this pack o' data!
